Object.Description: Give this valentine to a friend!

Every evil boss creates miniature versions of himself. It's just something they do.

Object.Description: Tamed wildlife from the Candyland Hunting Grounds.
This limited-edition bird will keep you company on all of your adventures. Proceeds go to help the victims of Hurricane Sandy.
